name: github-insights-dashboard
description: React app: dashboard for checking commit history with TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, Jest, Husky, and TailwindCSS

scripts.start: echo 'ğŸš€ Starting the app...' && webpack serve --config webpack.config.mjs && echo 'ğŸŒŸâœ¨ App is up and running! Visit http://localhost:3002/github-insights-dashboard/ âœ¨'
scripts.build: echo 'ğŸ”¨ Building the app...' && webpack --config webpack.config.mjs && echo 'ğŸ—ï¸âœ¨ Build completed! Your app is ready! âœ¨'
scripts.test:e2e: echo 'ğŸ­ Running Playwright E2E tests...' && npx playwright test
scripts.format: echo 'ğŸ–‹ï¸ Formatting code... Please wait.' && prettier --write . && echo 'âœ… Your code is formatted!'
scripts.lint: echo 'ğŸ§¹ Linting code... Please wait.' && eslint -c eslint.config.js . && echo 'âœ… Linting complete. Your code is clean!'
scripts.lint-fix: echo 'ğŸ”§ Linting and fixing issues...' && eslint --fix . && prettier --write .
scripts.precommit: echo 'ğŸ”’ Precommit: Linting and testing code...' && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.pretest: echo 'ğŸ” Pretest: Linting code...' && npm run lint
scripts.debug: echo 'ğŸ Starting the app in debug mode...' && NODE_ENV=development nodemon --inspect src/index.tsx
scripts.clean: echo 'ğŸ§½ Cleaning up...' && rm -rf ./node_modules ./dist && rm package-lock.json
scripts.prepare: husky install # ğŸ¶ Setting up Husky
scripts.docker-clean: echo 'ğŸ§¹ Cleaning up Docker resources...' && docker stop $(docker ps -aq) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) && docker image prune -af && docker volume prune -f && docker network prune -f && docker builder prune -f
scripts.generate-tests: echo 'ğŸ› ï¸ Generating missing test files... ğŸ“‚' && node scripts/generate-tests.js && echo 'âœ… Test generation complete! ğŸ‰'

author: Jagoda11
